title: Greek Islands Cooking
description: Theonie Mark remembers the olive harvests, the celebrations at the coming of spring, the ancient lullabies and the sun-drenched mountains and shores of her childhood among the people of the Greek islands.In the simple family kitchens furnished with their clay and copper pots and filled with the fresh produce of the countryside, she learnt the cooking of her ancestors in the way familiar to every young Greek island girl.This collection of 200 traditional recipes - many quite unknown to conventional European cookery but all adapted to modern methods and the lifestyle of modern cooks - is selected and arranged to follow the seasons of the Greek islands.ISBN 0713412836. Hardcover.
author: Theonie Mark
